ingredient-information.sestavine: 967497 06 - INGREDIENTS: AQUA / WATER, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER / SHEA BUTTER GLYCERIN, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, DICAPRYLYL ETHER, ALCOHOL DENAT., GLYCERYL STEARATE SE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 METHYLGLUCOSE DISTEARATE ZEA MAYS STARCH / CORN STARCH, STEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCINE SOJA OIL / SOYBEAN OIL, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF, JUICE POWDER, VITIS VINIFERA FRUIT WATER / GRAPE FRUIT WATER STEARIC ACID, CARBOMER, SODIUM HYALURONATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM PHYTATE, MYRISTIC ACID, PALMITIC ACID, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, XANTHAN GUM, TOCOPHEROL, SALICYLIC ACID, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE. (F.I.L B246437/1)

product-info.opis: HRANILNA KREMA za suho in občutljivo kožo. Obogatena z ekološko aloe vero in hialuronsko kislino naravnega izvora. Zagotavlja 48-urno** vlaženje kože, intenzivno jo nahrani in deluje pomirjujoče. Kremo nanesite vsako jutro in vsak večer na temeljito očiščen obraz.  **Instrumentalni preizkus, 24 žensk.

title: DNEVNA KREMA HYALURONIC ALOE CREAM, GARNIER, 50ML
